sentences.sContent: She chattered away happily until she noticed I wasn’t listening.
sentences.sCn: 她开心地说个不停，直到发觉我没在听才停下来。

sentences.sContent: She chattered excitedly like a child.
sentences.sCn: 她像个孩子似的兴奋地讲个不停。

synos.tran: 唠叨；喋喋不休；（动物等）吱吱叫
喋喋不休地说；使卡嗒卡嗒作声
唠叨；饶舌；（动物的）啁啾声；潺潺流水声

remMethod.val: 来自chat(v. 聊天； n. 闲谈)

words.tran: 饶舌的；爱讲闲话的；非正式的
饶舌的人；喋喋不休的人

trans.tranCn: 唠叨；喋喋不休；（动物等）吱吱叫
trans.tranOther: to talk quickly in a friendly way without stopping, especially about things that are not serious or important

trans.tranCn: 唠叨；饶舌；（动物的）啁啾声；潺潺流水声
trans.tranOther: talk, especially about things that are not serious or important
